info.title: MediNext EMR API
info.description: Comprehensive API for MediNext Electronic Medical Records system

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of appointments for the current clinic

post.description: Create a new appointment with conflict checking

422.description: Validation error or time slot not available

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific appointment

post.description: Check in a patient for their appointment
Check out a patient from their appointment

next_appointment_required.description: Whether a follow-up appointment is needed

422.description: Appointment not checked in or already checked out

post.description: Cancel an existing appointment

notes.example: Patient will call back to reschedule
Patient will call back to reschedule

422.description: Appointment already cancelled or validation error

post.description: Reschedule an existing appointment to a new date and time

send_notification.description: Whether to send notification to patient

message.example: Doctor has another appointment at this time

422.description: Invalid new date or validation error

post.description: Send a reminder notification for an upcoming appointment

custom_message.example: Don't forget your appointment tomorrow at 10:00 AM
Don't forget your appointment tomorrow at 10:00 AM

422.description: Appointment already cancelled or reminder not needed

get.description: Get available appointment time slots for a specific doctor and date
Check for scheduling conflicts for a proposed appointment

parameters.name: exclude_appointment_id
parameters.description: Appointment ID to exclude from conflict check (for rescheduling)

message.example: Doctor has another appointment at this time

get.description: Retrieve all appointments scheduled for today
Retrieve upcoming appointments for the next few days

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days to look ahead

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token

clinic_id.description: Optional clinic ID for multi-clinic access

post.description: Register a new user account
Logout user and revoke current access token
Generate a new access token and revoke the current one

422.description: Validation error or incorrect current password

Verify user's email address using verification token

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of medical encounters for the current clinic

post.description: Create a new medical encounter record

history_present_illness.example: Patient reports chest pain that started 2 days ago...

physical_examination.example: Vital signs stable, heart rate regular...

assessment.example: Possible cardiac issue, rule out MI

plan.example: Order EKG, chest X-ray, cardiac enzymes

description.example: Chronic ischemic heart disease, unspecified

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific encounter

chief_complaint.example: Chest pain and shortness of breath

subjective.example: Patient reports chest pain that started 2 hours ago

objective.example: Patient appears anxious, vital signs stable

assessment.example: Possible cardiac event, rule out myocardial infarction

plan.example: Order EKG, cardiac enzymes, chest X-ray

treatment_plan.example: Rest, monitor symptoms, follow up in 24 hours

follow_up_instructions.example: Return if symptoms worsen, follow up appointment in 1 week

notes.example: Patient educated about symptoms to watch for

get.description: Retrieve all prescriptions associated with an encounter
Retrieve all lab results associated with an encounter
Retrieve all file assets associated with an encounter

description.example: Chest X-ray for chest pain evaluation

post.description: Upload a file asset for an encounter

description.example: Chest X-ray for chest pain evaluation
Chest X-ray for chest pain evaluation

put.description: Update the SOAP (Subjective, Objective, Assessment, Plan) notes for an encounter

subjective.example: Patient reports chest pain that started 2 hours ago, described as sharp and localized to left side

objective.example: Patient appears anxious but alert. Vital signs: BP 120/80, HR 72, Temp 98.6°F, RR 16, O2 sat 98%. No acute distress noted

assessment.example: Chest pain, rule out cardiac etiology. Differential includes musculoskeletal pain, GERD, anxiety

plan.example: 1. Order EKG and cardiac enzymes 2. Chest X-ray 3. Consider stress test if cardiac enzymes negative 4. Follow up in 24 hours

treatment_plan.example: Rest, monitor symptoms, follow up in 24 hours. Consider cardiac workup if symptoms persist

follow_up_instructions.example: Return if symptoms worsen, follow up appointment in 1 week

chief_complaint.example: Chest pain and shortness of breath

subjective.example: Patient reports chest pain that started 2 hours ago

objective.example: Patient appears anxious, vital signs stable

assessment.example: Possible cardiac event, rule out myocardial infarction

plan.example: Order EKG, cardiac enzymes, chest X-ray

treatment_plan.example: Rest, monitor symptoms, follow up in 24 hours

follow_up_instructions.example: Return if symptoms worsen, follow up appointment in 1 week

post.description: Mark an encounter as completed and finalize all documentation

completion_notes.example: Encounter completed successfully. All tests ordered and prescriptions written.

discharge_instructions.example: Return if symptoms worsen, follow up appointment in 1 week

chief_complaint.example: Chest pain and shortness of breath

completion_notes.example: Encounter completed successfully. All tests ordered and prescriptions written.
